pageProduct.name: Swisse Vitamin C Effervescent Powder 20 X 5g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

SWISSE ULTIBOOST HIGH STRENGTH VITAMIN C EFFERVESCENT A premium quality, great-tasting effervescent tablet containing 1,000 mg of vitamin C to support immune health and help relieve common cold symptoms.

Warnings

Vitamin supplements should not replace a balanced diet.
If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.
For adults only.
The recommended daily dose of this medicine contains 297 mg of sodium.
Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place. Always replace cap after use.
Do not use if carton seal is torn or tamper evident seal is broken.
Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken.

Common Uses

IMMUNE HEALTH: Vitamin C supports immune system health and function.
COMMON COLD RELIEF: Vitamin C helps reduce the severity and duration of common cold symptoms.
SUPPORTS IMMUNE HEALTH
HELPS REDUCE SEVERITY & DURATION OF COMMONCOLD SYMPTOMS

Ingredients

EACH SACHET CONTAINS:
VITAMIN C (ascorbic acid) 1 g

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE – ADULT DOSAGE:One tablet daily, dissolved in water, or as directed by a healthcare professional. Once dissolved, consume immediately
